headline: Equifax (EFX) Enhances Kount 360 With Advanced Identity Proofing To Combat Fraud
summary: In September 2025, Equifax (EFX) launched its Identity Proofing feature, enhancing its Kount® 360 fraud platform, aimed at bolstering security for clients in sectors like finance and retail. Despite this development, Equifax's stock fell 2.48% over the last month, reflecting somewhat broader market trends which remained largely flat. While the company's fresh product offerings should have positively impacted investor sentiment, ongoing economic uncertainties, such as fluctuating Treasury...
